reference.title: House Rules
reference.shortdesc: While we want you to have the most comfortable and welcoming experience you can during your time at Shanks Hall, there are a number of house rules that must be followed in order to keep things running smoothly.

section.title: Smoking
section.p: Shanks Hall is a smoke-free environment, so we ask that you wait until you are 20 feet away from the building to partake.
